snippet.desc: This Behavior is responsible for keeping track of the current animation and overriding that animation (if appropriate) when a new animation request is made.
snippet.description: This Behavior is responsible for keeping track of the current animation and overriding that animation (if appropriate) when a new animation request is made.
snippet.name: Animation Manager

list.desc:
Enter in a list of animation categories.
Animations that are higher up will override
the ones below it.
list.name: _CategoryHierarchy

snippet.desc: Allows the actor to move up, down, left and right as well as in diagonal directions.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to move up, down, left and right as well as in diagonal directions.
snippet.name: 8 Way Movement

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to turn while moving.
boolean.name: _StopTurningWhileMoving

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will move in diagonal directions at the same speed as in axis-aligned directions.
If unselected, the actor will move in diagonal direction at a speed that is the sum of the axis-aligned velocities.
boolean.name: _NormalizeDiagonalSpeed

boolean.desc:
If selected, the control attributes will be used to control the movement.
If unselected, the control attributes are ignored and the movement can be controlled by triggering custom events.
Trigger the events MoveUp, MoveDown, MoveLeft or MoveRight to make the actor move as if the keys were pressed.
boolean.name: _UseControls

number.desc: The speed of the movement.
number.name: _Speed

boolean.desc: If selected, the animation attributes will be used, otherwise they will be ignored.
boolean.name: _UseAnimations

boolean.desc: If selected and moving in a diagonal direction, the Up and Down animations will be used, otherwise the Left and Right animations will be used.
boolean.name: _PreferVerticalAnimtations

snippet.desc: Makes the camera follow this Actor.
snippet.description: Makes the camera follow this Actor.
snippet.name: Camera Follow Player

number.desc: Horizontal Offset from the Actor
number.name: _XOffset

number.desc: Vertical Offset from the Actor
number.name: _YOffset

snippet.desc: This Behavior controls the player's jumping.
snippet.description: This Behavior controls the player's jumping.
snippet.name: Jumping

control.desc: Select the key used for jumping.
control.name: _JumpKey

number.desc:
Maximum amount of time that the
jump force will be applied when holding down the jump button.

default = 0.075
number.name: _MaxJumpTime

animation.desc: Animation used for jumping to the right.
animation.name: _JumpRightAnimation

animation.desc: Animation used for jumping to the left.
animation.name: _JumpLeftAnimation

number.desc:
When releasing the jump key before reaching the max
height, what is the rate of upward slowdown?

default = 0.75
number.name: _JumpingSlowdown

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

number.desc:
Amount of force applied when jumping.
Default = 35
number.name: _JumpForce

snippet.desc: This Behavior will handle the player's walking movement while on the ground.
snippet.description: This Behavior will handle the player's walking movement while on the ground.
snippet.name: Walking

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the right.
control.name: _MoveRightKey

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the left.
control.name: _MoveLeftKey

number.desc:
How fast should the Actor get up to speed?

default = 85
number.name: _Acceleration

number.desc:
Maximum speed while walking

default = 20
number.name: _MaxWalkingSpeed

boolean.desc:
Should the speed of the Actor be limited to
the maximum speed specified?
boolean.name: _LimitSpeed

list.desc: If any of these Actor attributes are set to True, disable walking.
list.name: _DisableStatuses

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

snippet.desc: This Behavior allows the player to jump off of walls.
snippet.description: This Behavior allows the player to jump off of walls.
snippet.name: Wall Jumping

control.desc: Select the key used for jumping.
control.name: _JumpKey

number.desc:
Angle used when jumping towards the right

default = 290
number.name: _JumpRightAngle

number.desc:
Angle used when jumping towards the left

default = 250
number.name: _JumpLeftAngle

number.desc:
Amount of force to apply during the jump

default = 65
number.name: _JumpForce

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

animation.desc: Animation quand il meurt et qu'il descend sous la terre
animation.name: _ghost

number.desc: Amplitude du balancement dans la descente sous la terre
number.name: _AmplitudeDescente

number.desc: Amortissement de la chute lors de la descente sous la terre
number.name: _AmortissementDescente

number.desc: Periode de balancement lors de la descente sous terre
number.name: _BalancementDescente

snippet.desc: This Behavior allows the player to slide down walls slowly.
snippet.description: This Behavior allows the player to slide down walls slowly.
snippet.name: Wall Sliding

control.desc: Select the key used for moving to the left.
control.name: _LeftKey

control.desc: Select the key used for moving to the right.
control.name: _RightKey

number.desc:
How fast should the Actor drop while sliding?

default = 7
number.name: _SlideSpeed

boolean.desc: Only allow the Actor to slide on tiles?
boolean.name: _LimittoTiles

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

snippet.desc: This Behavior will allow the player to increase speed into the ground from when in the air.
snippet.description: This Behavior will allow the player to increase speed into the ground from when in the air.
snippet.name: Ground Pound

boolean.desc: Does the down key have to be held down to ground pound?
boolean.name: _DownKeyRequired

number.desc: Amount of force to push the Actor down
number.name: _Force

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

snippet.desc: If the Actor falls off the bottom of the screen, the scene will be reloaded.
snippet.description: If the Actor falls off the bottom of the screen, the scene will be reloaded.
snippet.name: Die in Pit

number.desc: Set the amount of time the screen will fade after falling in. In and Out will be the same.
number.name: _FadeTime

number.desc:
Set this to how long you wish to wait before reloading the scene.
Useful for displaying a Spawned Actor on Death animation so it completes before the reload.
number.name: _TimeBeforeReload

snippet.desc: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Cannot Exit Screen

snippet.desc: This Behavior controls the player's ability to run. The Walking Behavior must also be attached for this Behavior to work properly.
snippet.description: This Behavior controls the player's ability to run. The Walking Behavior must also be attached for this Behavior to work properly.
snippet.name: Running

boolean.desc: Prevent the Actor from running?
boolean.name: _PreventRunning

control.desc: Select the key used to run.
control.name: _RunKey

number.desc:
How fast should the Actor get up to running speed?

default = 100
number.name: _Acceleration

number.desc:
Enter the medium running speed.

default = 25
number.name: _MidRunSpeed

number.desc:
Enter the maximum running speed.

default =35
number.name: _MaxRunSpeed

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the right.
control.name: _RightKey

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the left.
control.name: _LeftKey

number.desc:
How long should it take to get up to max speed?

default = 0.4
number.name: _TimeToMaxSpeed

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

snippet.desc: This Behavior is responsible for slowing the player down when no direction keys are being pressed.
snippet.description: This Behavior is responsible for slowing the player down when no direction keys are being pressed.
snippet.name: Slowdown

control.desc: Select the control used to move to the right.
control.name: _RightKey

control.desc: Select the control used to move to the left.
control.name: _LeftKey

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while on the ground and movement keys are not being pressed.

default = 0.9
number.name: _GroundSlowdown

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while in the air.

default = 0.99
number.name: _AirSlowdown

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while ducking.

default = 0.975
number.name: _DuckingSlowdown

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while moving through the air.

default = 0.975
number.name: _MovingAirSlowdown

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while on the ground, a movement key is being pressed, and the Actor is over its max speed. This will slow the Actor back down to the max speed.

default = 0.9
number.name: _MovingGroundSlowdown

snippet.desc: Allows the actor to move left and right.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to move left and right.
snippet.name: 2 Way Horizontal Movement

boolean.desc:
If selected, the control attributes will be used to control the movement.
If unselected, the control attributes are ignored and the movement can be controlled by triggering custom events. Trigger the events MoveLeft or MoveRight to make the actor move as if the keys were pressed.
boolean.name: _UseControls

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to move vertically.
boolean.name: _PreventVerticalMovement

number.desc: The speed of the movement.
number.name: _Speed

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to turn while moving.
boolean.name: _StopTurning

boolean.desc: If selected, the animation attributes will be used, otherwise they will be ignored.
boolean.name: _UseAnimations

snippet.desc: Makes the actor move back and forth horizontally.
snippet.description: Makes the actor move back and forth horizontally.
snippet.name: Back and Forth Horizontally

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving to the left.
number.name: _DistanceLeft

number.desc: The movement speed.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The direction in which the actor will be moving when created.
number.name: _InitialDirection

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving to the right.
number.name: _DistanceRight

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will change the movement direction when colliding.
If unselected, the actor will try to keep on moving in the current direction.
boolean.name: _ChangeDirectiononCollision

snippet.desc: This Behavior determines if the player is on the ground and sets an Actor Level Attribute as appropriate. Other Behaviors can then use this Attribute to drive their logic.
snippet.description: This Behavior determines if the player is on the ground and sets an Actor Level Attribute as appropriate. Other Behaviors can then use this Attribute to drive their logic.
snippet.name: On Ground

boolean.desc: Only detect that the player is on the ground if standing on a tile?
boolean.name: _LimitToTiles

list.desc: If not limited to tiles, enter in any Actor Group that you want to exclude from ground collisions.
list.name: _ExcludedGroups

snippet.desc: Allows the player to move in 4 directions: North, South, West,and East Allows the player to move in 8 directions: North, South, West, East, NorthWest, NorthEast, SouthWest, SouthEast Allows the player to move isometrically.
snippet.description: Allows the player to move in 4 directions: North, South, West,and East Allows the player to move in 8 directions: North, South, West, East, NorthWest, NorthEast, SouthWest, SouthEast Allows the player to move isometrically.
snippet.name: 4 Way Movement

number.desc: How fast it reaches top speed.
number.name: accel

number.desc: The fastest it will move.
number.name: topSpeed

number.desc: How quickly it loses speed when the key's let go.
number.name: decel

boolean.desc: Check this if you want this actor to be controlled by the player.
boolean.name: player

boolean.desc: Check this if you want your character to move isometrically.
boolean.name: _IsometricMovement

number.desc: Speed below which we display the "idle" animation.
number.name: idleSpeed

boolean.desc: Check this to allow 8-way movement. An actor cannot move both isometrically and 8 ways.
boolean.name: _8WayMovement

number.desc: décalage x de l'objet dans les mains
number.name: _offsetx

number.desc: décalage y de l'objet dans les mains
number.name: _offsety

snippet.desc:
Also known as Double Jumping. Allows the player to jump while in the air.

Inputs:
"Is Jumping?" -- Actor Level Attribute
Outputs:
"Is Air Jumping?" -- Actor Level Attribute
snippet.description:
Also known as Double Jumping. Allows the player to jump while in the air.

Inputs:
"Is Jumping?" -- Actor Level Attribute
Outputs:
"Is Air Jumping?" -- Actor Level Attribute
snippet.name: Air Jumping

number.desc:
How many times can the actor jump in the
air before having to touch the ground?

default = 999
number.name: _MaxJumps

control.desc: Select the key used for jumping.
control.name: _JumpKey

boolean.desc:
Does the Actor have to be moving upward
in order to air jump?
boolean.name: _MustBeRising

number.desc:
Amount of jump force to apply

default = 50
number.name: _JumpForce

animation.desc: Animation to use when air jumping to the right
animation.name: _JumpRightAnimation

animation.desc: Animation to use when air jumping to the left
animation.name: _JumpLeftAnimation

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

number.desc: The distance between the peak and the initial axis.
number.name: _AmplitudeY

snippet.desc: This Behavior is responsible for detecting when the player is falling, and playing the proper animation.
snippet.description: This Behavior is responsible for detecting when the player is falling, and playing the proper animation.
snippet.name: Falling

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

snippet.desc: This Behavior will allow the player to duck.
snippet.description: This Behavior will allow the player to duck.
snippet.name: Ducking

control.desc: Select the key used for ducking.
control.name: _DuckKey

text.desc: Set the category used for the animation - used for the hierarchy.
text.name: _AnimationCategory

snippet.desc: Make the actor move in a wavelike motion.
snippet.description: Make the actor move in a wavelike motion.
snippet.name: Wave Motion

number.desc: The distance after which the wave repeats itself.
number.name: _Wavelength

number.desc: The distance between the peak and the initial axis.
number.name: _Amplitude

number.desc:
The starting speed.
If Direction is Horizontal, the actor will move to the right if Starting Speed is positive, or to the left if it is negative.
If Direction is Vertical, the actor will move to down if Starting Speed is positive, or up if it is negative.
number.name: _StartingSpeed

number.desc: The distance between the peak and the initial axis.
number.name: _Amplitude

snippet.desc: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Always Simulate

boolean.desc: Enable continuous collision?
boolean.name: _ContinuousCollision
